short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assign keyboard shortcuts to specific websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For all Chrome hyper users out there, this is a Shortcut tool for websites.

Use this extension to:
 • Put your favorite websites on keyboard shortcuts.
 • Choose the Shortcut keys you want to have.
 • Use the shortcuts even when Chrome is minimized. (To activate, go to chrome://extensions/shortcuts and change the option for each shortcut from "In Chrome" to "Global")

Full keyboard accessibility is supported.

Happy productivity!
